TopicTitle: Who knew ships colliding at 26 m/s on the ocean could cause so much damage? /s

Articles.Content:
Well, that's about 58 MPH, so I can see how it'd be heavy damage. Anyway, here we see the DMR (Dreemurr Royal Navy) Harekaze slamming into the DMR Akeno at 26 m/s about 4 km from KSC Island due to a major navigational error by the captain of the Harekaze. (If anybody knows the anime that the ship names are a reference to, 10 points.)

https://imgur.com/a/TmRxx because album embedding seems to be broken again.

You have no idea how laggy the collision and resulting explosions were... but it was worth it. All but 8 (out of 32) crew members on both ships were killed. Thankfully I saved about ten minutes before the collision. Yes, this was staged. I was just having some fun.

Edited February 27, 2018 by UnionPacific1983WP

(If anybody knows the anime that the ship names are a reference to, 10 points.)
